Dash Callbacks¶

app.update_changes_hover(hover_data, figure)¶

Update layout of plotly graph on hover

Parameters

  • hover_data -- trigger on hover

  • figure (dict) -- figure for plot

Returns

updated figure for plot

Return type

(dict)
